coming-soon.title: Coming Soon
coming-soon.description: This section is under development, you will see it available at a later date.

no-data.title: No Data
no-data.description: No data available. If you believe it is an issue, please contact support.

404.title: Not found
404.description: Check the URL or your life choices.

critical-error.title: Error Occurred
critical-error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support. Or abandon the industrial society and build a cabin in the woods.

error-boundary.title: Something went wrong
error-boundary.description-1: <0>Refreshing this page</0> could help. If it does not, you can contact support.
error-boundary.description-2: Or abandon the industrial society and <0>move to a cabin in the woods</0>.

refresh.short: New version available, click here to refresh

name: Name
new-version: New version, click me to update
infinitely-better: Yes, the current value is infinity percent better because the starting value is 0
infinitely-worse: Yes, the current value is infinity percent worse because the starting value is 0

validation.2fa-invalid-format: The code should be a 6 digit number
validation.max-decimals: Please enter numbers with no more than {{maxDecimals}} decimal places.
validation.letter-number: Should contain at least one letter or number
